com.gmail.etordera.imaging

Class JPEGMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gmail.etordera.imaging.JPEGMetadata

  • public class JPEGMetadata
extends java.lang.Object
    Gets metadata from JPEG images.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ADOBE_TRANSFORM_UNKNOWN
      Adobe color transform unknown (GRAY, RGB or CMYK values)

      Adobe color transform YCCK

      ID for AdobeRGB Exif color space

      ID for sRGB Exif color space
      static int EXIF_CS_UNKNOWN
      ID for unknown Exif color space

      • saveThumbnail

        public boolean saveThumbnail(java.lang.String thumbnail)
        Saves JPEG thumbnail to file.
        Parameters:
        thumbnail - Path to output thumbnail file
        Returns:
        true on succes, false on error

      • getThumbnailAsInputStream

        public java.io.ByteArrayInputStream getThumbnailAsInputStream()
        Gets an InputStream from where thumbnail can be read.
        Returns:
        thumbnail data, or null if unable to load.

      • hasThumbnail

        public boolean hasThumbnail()
        Check if embedded thumbnail could be read
        Returns:
        true if thumbnail was found and is available, false if not

      • getIccProfile

        public java.awt.color.ICC_Profile getIccProfile()
        Gets embedded ICC color profile.
        Returns:
        Embedded ICC color profile, or null if not detected.

      • getOrientation

        public long getOrientation()
        Get image orientation.
        Returns:
        Image orientation Exif value

      • getExifColorSpace

        public long getExifColorSpace()
        Get Exif color space.
        Returns:
        Exif color space id (JPEGMetadata.EXIF_CS*)

      • getAdobeColorTransform

        public int getAdobeColorTransform()
        Gets Adobe Color Transform ID. Tells if channel data is direct RGB/CMYK, YCbCr or YCCK.
        Returns:
        Adobe Color Transform ID (JPEGMetadata.ADOBE_TRANSFORM_*)

      • isAdobeApp14Found

        public boolean isAdobeApp14Found()
        Tells wether an Adobe APP14 JPEG segment was found in the metadata.
        If this marker was found, getAdobeColorTransform() will return the detected Adobe Color Transform ID.
        Returns:
        true if an Adobe APP14 JPEG segment was found in the metadata.

      • isLogging

        public boolean isLogging()
        Check if debug logging is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if debug logging is enabled, false otherwise

      • setLogging

        public void setLogging(boolean logging)
        Set debug logging status
        Parameters:
        logging - true for enabling debug loggin, false to disable

      • getPixelSize

        public static java.awt.Dimension getPixelSize(java.io.File jpegFile)
        Gets pixel size of an image file, without having to load image into memory.
        Parameters:
        jpegFile - Image file
        Returns:
        Image pixel dimensions, or (0,0) if not able to read.

      • getIccProfile

        public static java.awt.color.ICC_Profile getIccProfile(java.lang.String imagePath)
        Extract ICC Profile embedded in a JPEG file
        Parameters:
        imagePath - Path to JPEG file
        Returns:
        Embedded ICC Profile, or null if not found

      • embedIccProfile

        public static boolean embedIccProfile(java.awt.color.ICC_Profile iccProfile,
                      java.lang.String imagePath)
        Embeds an ICC Profile into an existing JPEG image file.
        Parameters:
        iccProfile - ICC Profile to embed
        imagePath - JPEG image file to modify
        Returns:
        true on success, false on failure

      • getDpi

        public static int getDpi(java.lang.String filename)
        Get horizontal DPI resolution from metadata of a given file.
        Parameters:
        filename - Path to file
        Returns:
        DPI value, or 0 if not found in metadata.
